alert.note: Alert for Kahoolawe in Maui (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 15 at 4:06PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM HST THIS EVENING FOR THE ISLAND OF LANAI IN MAUI COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The island of Lanai in Maui County. * WHEN...Until 715 PM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 403 PM HST, radar indicated a nearly stationary rain band over Lanai City. Rain was falling at a rate of up to 2 inches per hour. Rainfall should be on the decrease this evening. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lanai City, Manele and Lanai Airport. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 715 PM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
